titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of and expressing the condolences of the Senate on the passing of Dr. Richard Errett Smalley.
A resolution honoring the life of and expressing the condolences of the Senate on the passing of Dr. Richard Errett Smalley.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that the Senate honors the life and accomplishments of Dr. Richard Errett Smalley, a recipient of the Nobel Prize in Chemistry, and expresses its condolences on his passing.
